review.title: Flexible and robust tool of doing almost everything
review.description: Leankit is a fantastic visual production status/progress/pipeline/organization tool! We're using it to optimize the workflow and keep track of hundreds of products at different stages of testing, and fulfillment. The only thing we would like to see improved is the ability to link more than one card together, and have the status of one update the other - or options similar to that functionality.

review.title: Excellent tool
review.description:
Love the product. I use it constantly for Personal and work Kanban. It's fantastic.

The only thing I'd like to be better is how billing works. It's strange that I should have to log in to NetSuite to manage my subscription. It's a hassle, and if the product wasn't so good, I'd consider dropping it for that reason. Fortunately, the product is really good.

review.title: Mereton Textiles
review.description:
We use leankit for our production planning and sales visit calls, the fact that its real time and can be used anywhere anytime is great.

Workflow has dramatically improved especially in the areas of production planning and as a result has improved customer service.

review.title: Super duper
review.description: Absolutely awesome! easy to use and understand. My team loves it.

review.title: First use
review.description: In our first experience of Scrum Methodology, LeanKit has been a very useful addition and has helped in its success.

review.title: Flexibility is king
review.description:
I have recommended LeanKit at several client sites, where it had always helped visualise the work through it's lifecycle.  We have found it to be particularly useful for when there are board users who need to work remotely.
The flexibility in board design has allowed us to use it for other applications too, such as Story Board Mapping and Retrospectives.  We can collaborate remotely on what would usually involve Post-It notes if we were in the same location.

review.title: lean it out
review.description: it helps us know where each pump is in the line and whats coming up

review.title: Nice for Pull system in Mnaufacturing Production
review.description:
Leankit has taken place for our old PPS System. 
We made with it the change from push to pull in our Production lines.

review.title: Enhanced visibility & focus on working on what can and will get done!
review.description: Leankit has significantly improved visibility into our IT/IS Operations and has afforded us the necessary means to effectively plan and strategize with our business's operational teams.
review.jobTitle: Vice President of IT & Field Operations

review.title: Gets the basics right
review.description: There are a lot of features and enhancements that I can think of (text formatting, linking stories more intuitively, adding images inline in comments and ticket descriptions, minimizing swimlanes, the list goes on) but as a tool for keeping a team fed with new work and aware of where that work lies, it gets the job done. I hope this tool will continue to improve in the ways listed above as well as in terms of UI, UX< and performance.
